( I love that) They are friendly and never mind my special requests! I gamboled after dinner  not only won more than enough to pay for 5 more dinners, but was entered into a Tuesday drawing with the chance to win $5,500 dollars cash!  I tell everyone I can about Ichabod's it is really the best I have found.

Amazing food, quiet atmosphere, and good times with your friends. That is what ichabods is about. There cold sandwiches are to die for,  and the service there is great. I love going to ichabods with the family.

The video poker is definitely a good time. Always go for the filet or filet caesar on their menu-- one of the best steaks I've ever had. The bartenders are beyond friendly, your drink is always fresh, and the regulars are always down for making conversation. One of my favorite places to visit off the strip for sure.

Old school Vegas. Good food, good service. Nice atmoshphere. The salad bar...boring. I hate these salad in a bag places. That is what they offer. Lettuce cut up somewhere else and trucked in in plastic bags. Veggies sliced somewhere else and shipped in in plastic bags or containers. Boring.   Now the good part. I ordered the ribeye. One of the best steaks I have eaten in some time. The steak was flavorfully cooked, juicy, and flavorful. My guest ordered a pasta dish that was not what she wanted. It was too full of wine sauce. We asked the server and they replaced it with my guests second choice from the menu. No Charge even thou we offered to pay for the food. It was not the kitchens fault. It was just not what we expected.   Service couldn't have been better. Wonderful service, wonderful food. Lots of old people. Not a real young peoples place. Keep up the great work!!!!!

We dined last night and had the worst service! It was a Tuesday night not that busy and yet the servers were non existent once we were seated. Finally a server came by and asked have you been helped. We ordered right away. I ordered a meal with the soup and salad bar.  The soup is not on the bar so I had to ask someone who explained they would have to get the soup for me out of the kitchen. I told her what kind I wanted and were I was sitting she said she would get it for me. It never came I asked someone else for the soup it to never came. Now the food came and the server dropped off the food and never came back. My husband asked for rolls and butter from someone else and when they finally came there was no butter.  The food is just average. And every time I have been there the service is lousy! Beginner servers maybe?  It is always an older crowd maybe they don't care weather the service is lousy or not! Don't waste your time or money!

We used to visit ichabods at least once a week when you could get the best salad bar in town  for free with an entree.. Then the price went to $2.99, we still came because it was still the best in town.  Then it jumped to $3.99 and we noticed smaller portions and higher menu prices. . So we stopped coming. . After about 6 month or so we stopped last night as I was craving that salad bar.  I ordered the hot turkey $8.99 and my partner had the chicken parm sandwich. We then asked to add the salad bar and was told it was now $6.99 to add the bar to a sandwich. So, no salad bar for us.  You can only get the salad bar for $3.99. If you have an entree or order a special. The chicken parm was delicious,  a true winner.  My turkey, was a tiny scoop of mash and bread with a few turkey pieces. . While good, the portion was Def smaller than ever. . To say the least I think they probably have lost 3 customers for good,  and yes that salad bar was still looking good but, they took the soup away and now you have to order it from the kitchen instead of it being at the salad area.

This review is pretty much only a nacho review because I heard that the nachos were the best in the city and lately I have become a bit of a nacho tramp and I'm working my way around the city to find the best batch. The basic rundown: the bar is a typical bar but the restaurant is actually pretty cozy and perfect for hangover Sundays...or Mondays...or Wednesdays, you get the point, it's dark, dimly lit and has lots of booths. It has a very old school feel with pictures of old school Vegas. The server was awesome (minus the Raiders shirt), nice and very attentive.   On to the food, I hate reading too many positive reviews about a place because then it places my expectations too high and all I read was how good Ichabod's nachos are. Well... the reviewers were right, the nachos were pretty good. I didn't want to believe people when they said it was some of the best in the city but it definitely warrants top 5 consideration. Right blend of cheese, chicken, and no overkill on the chips. Sold.
first time here I order the chicken and portobello mushroom pasta pasta perfectly done chicken and mushroom succulent will definitely be back to try something different off the menu

BOOM!!  I've lived in this neighborhood for five years, passed Ichabod's thousands of times, and never until today made it inside.  I am five years late.  This place is my new favorite restaurant, bar, hangout.  Super clean, great bar ambiance, and the kind of friendly waitresses that you remember from the 'old days' but can never find anymore (Julie was A++). Our Bloody Caesars were out in a flash and absolutely yummy; the food that followed was surprisingly fast, hot, and tasty.   *Happy note for other Horrible Smokers : On the bar/lounge side, there are actual ashtrays on the actual tables, and nobody will give you stink-eye when you light up.
This place has a old Vegas vibe there is a piano bar the fish and chips are excellent. Big dinning area we like to eat at the bar service is always great

This is a great place . The servers are very accommodating and make you feel very welcome. The food is excellent and will make adjustments to the menu. Next time I go I will take pictures as you need to see the presentation.

It's a mixed bag at Ichabod's. We do go frequently but mostly for the Thursday  music prevention. Like the old Vegas atmosphere and the service is tops but the food is just average. They have a couple if good pasta dishes which I would rate a four but everything else is just a three

Good food and a quiet little atmosphere I like that they don't rush you out of there.  It's a nice place to go with friends and talk and not feel like they're trying to turn tables can't wait to go again

Lived here 12 years and I passed this place up and don't know why.  Awesome staff,  awesome piano player and the owner is so awesome it is unbelievable.   I use awesome very weakly because it's the strongest word I know.  Come out and have fun.      It's killer.
